attributes.action: reject the proposal of paying yobs and inadequate parents to behave and use the proposed money to put more police on the beat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the proposal to bribe yobs and their inadequate parent is a slap in the face for all parents and children that conform to the rules and required behavour of this country and the mear fact that this proposal got air time is testiment to the fact that all life style affecting issues need to go through a common sense commitee made up of normal, feet on the ground citizens, who live the daily life some of our, so called, betters are trying to fiddle with from their lofty insulated lives.
if this proposal goes further i would suggest we normal citezens remove our consent for the goverment to use our money in this fashion.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BenefitBonus/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
